name: Fast-Track Trainline
description:
At the Fast-Track Trainline, customers come first. We're so dedicated to our customers that every ticket comes with a free 'boarding-for-you' service to make it even easier (and quicker) for you to board our trains!

As a valued employee it will be your job to help us deliver this service to our customers. Each customer's ticket has a class (that they'll proudly show) that matches up with one of our passenger carriages. Place them in the doors of the correct carriage to serve them making sure to avoid any kidnappings (see section 32 of the handbook). 

(Note: You ARE replaceable so make sure you're on that train when it leaves otherwise we'll get a new you)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Recommend playing with a controller!

Controller:

Left stick - Move

Right stick - Aim (optional)

Right Trigger - Grab/Release

Button South - Menu Button Selection

Keyboard & Mouse:

W,S,A,D - Move

Mouse - Aim (optional)

Space - Grab/Release

Produced in a week for the GJL Fall 2021 game jam! All assets (except those stated below) were created by myself within the jam timeframe. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated :) Hope you enjoy!

Audio Used:

  • "Train Door Beep, B.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
  • "Astounded" by Christopher J Astbury (https://freesound.org/people/Astounded/sounds/481082/)
  • "Ambience, London Waterloo Train Station.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
  • https://freesound.org/people/eliasheuninck/sounds/170464/
  • https://freesound.org/people/eliot-beats/sounds/538021/
